Overview

This is a sample documentation template for the Journeyman Jobs application. It demonstrates the electrical-themed design system with navy blue and copper accents.

Architecture

🏗️ System Components
  • Frontend: Flutter 3.x with Riverpod state management
  • Backend: Firebase (Authentication, Firestore, Storage)
  • Design System: Custom electrical-themed components
  • Navigation: go_router for type-safe routing

Feature Modules

Module Description Status Priority
Jobs Job listings and search functionality Active High
Locals IBEW union local directory Active High
Storm Work Emergency restoration opportunities Active High
Contacts Industry contact management In Progress Medium

Implementation Details

Code Example

// Example: Creating a themed card widget
Container(
  decoration: BoxDecoration(
    color: AppTheme.white,
    borderRadius: BorderRadius.circular(AppTheme.radiusMd),
    border: Border.all(
      color: AppTheme.accentCopper,
      width: AppTheme.borderWidthMedium,
    ),
    boxShadow: AppTheme.shadowCard,
  ),
  child: Padding(
    padding: const EdgeInsets.all(AppTheme.spacingMd),
    child: YourContentWidget(),
  ),
)

Design System Constants

🎨 Theme Values
  • Primary Navy: #1A202C
  • Accent Copper: #B45309
  • Border Width: 1.5px (Medium)
  • Border Radius: 12px (Medium)
  • Shadow: shadowCard
